      • isAllowNonCoveredRoots

        public boolean isAllowNonCoveredRoots()
        Allow the package filter to specify filter roots which are not covered by the validation filter, and which are not ancestors of any roots specified by the validation filter
        Specified by:
        isAllowNonCoveredRoots in interface ValidationOptions
        Returns:
        true to allow non-covered roots

      • getForbiddenExtensions

        public List<String> getForbiddenExtensions()
        Define a list of forbidden file extensions, each of which must begin with a period, followed by one-to-many word characters or periods. Empty elements will be skipped. If an element does not begin with a period, it will be added before evaluation.
        Specified by:
        getForbiddenExtensions in interface ValidationOptions
        Returns:
        a list of extensions, or null

      • setForbiddenExtensions

        public DefaultValidationOptions setForbiddenExtensions(List<String> forbiddenExtensions)
